jd: From: Avinash Kumar, Altitude Technology Solutions Inc a.kumar@atsitinc.com Reply to: a.kumar@atsitinc.com Hi,Hope you are doing well!!I am trying to reach you for urgent basis requirement from our client. If you are interested then revert back with Updated Resume to move the further step. Job Title: Technical Project Manager in ZuoraJob Location: San Francisco, CA Onsite, USAJob Duration: Contract Job Description:Active PMP, Scrum Master, and SAFE 2.0 certification are required 15+ years of IT experience10+ years of program management experience as a TPM in Salesforce/Zuora/Commerce DomainAble to perform activities related to the Project planning ( Resource planning, Project Kick-Off, Sprint Planning, Project Timeline planning )Able to perform activities related to Project execution ( Scrum backlog management, Product backlog grooming, daily sprint update)Able to perform activities related to Project Monitoring ( Status reporting, Risk Management)Able to manage stakeholders across DTS and BusinessReporting to DTS leadershipHandon with Jira reporting and scrum processWilling to learn the Zuora domain and able to spend 30% of his time as a Business Analyst Regards,Avinash Kumar304-505-7604a.kumar@atsitinc.comAltitude Technology Solutions Inc.
